title: Samsung’s dedicated chip for Galaxy phones may not arrive until 2025
content:
Google’s switch to Tensor in the Pixel 6 has seemingly sent waves through the rest of the Android market. Earlier this year, Samsung executives announced plans for a chip dedicated to the company’s Galaxy smartphones, but it seems that won’t actually arrive for a few years.

more…

The post Samsung’s dedicated chip for Galaxy phones may not arrive until 2025 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A reliable source claims that Samsung won't debut its chip dedicated to Galaxy smartphones until 2025 with the Galaxy S25.
